TermDesc: Inflict Photochromic Flux when hitting a target with Basic Attack - Polychrome Leap, Basic Attack - Iridescent Splash, Basic Attack - Visual Impact and Intro Skill - Time to Show Some Colors!. Photochromic Flux inflicts Tune Rupture - Shifting/Tune Strain - Shifting on targets for 25s when Lynae is in Resonance Mode - Tune Rupture/Resonance Mode - Tune Strain.
